com.noelios.restlet
Class RedirectRestlet

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.AbstractRestlet
      com.noelios.restlet.RedirectRestlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, Restlet
public class RedirectRestlet
extends AbstractRestlet

Rewrites URIs then redirects the call or the client to a new destination.

See Also:
RestletCallModel
